roleset.name: assign a nickname
roleset.note: NICKNAME-V NOTES: The fact that the active seems awkward (at best) might indicate that"nicknamed"is a predicative adjective, not a passivized verb. (from nickname.01-v)

example.name: passive
example.text: While Mr. Roderick was reared in the shadows of Pittsburgh's smoking mills, Mr. Corry grew up in Cincinnati, [a city]-1 nicknamed *trace*-1 ``Porkapolis'' and more accustomed to pork chops than pig iron.

example.name: active seems a little odd
example.text: Mary nicknamed John Squishy-squishy Nowaka Eblis O'Shaunessy.
